1.text: The main factory for the company Zync. I need to learn about what they are doing to the environment so I can write my suggestions for new laws.

2.text: [color=#5890cb]Gas powered cars[/color] release [color=#ffff00]greenhouse gases and pollute the air[/color]. A large amount of the gas released is [color=#ffff00]carbon dioxide (CO2)[/color].

3.text: [color=#5890cb]Large chimneys[/color] that release [color=#ffff00]greenhouse gases[/color] such as [color=#ffff00]carbon dioxide (CO2)[/color] into the air. Gases are usually released from the burning of [color=#ffff00]fuels such as coal[/color].
